metadata.title: CVE-2022-3046 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Browser Tag in Google Chrome prior to 105.0.5195.52allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
